data.name: ACCA: 13-Territory Inspection Dept.: Where Pride and Train Tracks Lead
data.short_description: In Rokkusu District for an audit, Jean finds Grossular visiting his homeland. Jean has an honest conversation with Grossular about his thoughts on the coup rumors before he departs. Back in Bādon, the Inspection Department staff are abuzz with plans to celebrate the coming new year. Eventually, the
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
